roleset.name: characterized by majesty; stately
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6.

example.name: arg1
example.text: On May 10 , 2009 , the family members of the White House staff were paying a visit to the White House when American President Obama stooped down to allow a little boy to touch his hair . A president is = exalted and majestic , how could he lower his noble head ?
